str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A hearer of, a listener to. From akroaomai; a hearer.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a maker, poet, (b) a doer, carrier out, performer. From poieo; a performer; specially, a 'poet'.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.
